description: This crunchy winter slaw is a delicious, and healthy, accompaniment for leftover roast beef. Each serving provides 400kcal, 6g protein, 16g carbohydrate (of which 16g sugars), 31g fat (of which 3g saturates), 11g fibre and 0.2g salt.

default: 2 carrots, peeled and cut into matchsticks
handful walnuts, out of their shells, roughly chopped
1 tbsp sherry or red wine vinegar
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Place the sliced cabbage, carrots and walnuts into a large bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together the walnut oil, sherry or red wine vinegar and mustard. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper, then drizzle over the salad and toss well to coat.
To serve, pile onto a serving plate.
title: Winter salad
